data.actual_result: The semicircle comes directly from the search box.
data.expected_result: When you search something, the semicircle still comes from a bit of space below the search box.
data.short_description: The bottom of the border of the search box vanishes when you hit on search.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel and open search. - Try to scroll up in the page and observe the point from which the semicircular thing comes. - Now, search something. - again, try to scroll up in the page (while staying at the top) and observe the point from which the semicircular thing comes.
